chartIndex.noCharts: No charts yet. Create one now!

charts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete chart {name}?

settings.useRpeEasingIdWarning: Using RPE Easing ID will disable EaseInOutQuint and EaseInOutExpo.

create.title: Create Chart
create.name: Track Name

alert.name: Please enter the track name
alert.bpm: Please enter the correct base BPM

create.success: Chart created successfully. Redirecting to the chart in 3 seconds.

import.title: Import Chart
import.formathint: You can import charts using PEZ/ZIP packages, or upload the chart (compatible with RPEJSON), music, and illustration separately.

alert.unzipFailed: Unzip failed. Please check if the file is corrupted or in the correct format.

form.hint: Chart identifier is used to index charts. Please use easy-to-remember English + numeric names (preferably without spaces)

idState.occupied: This identifier is already in use

alert.folderOccupied: This folder is already in use but was not previously recognized as a chart: {folder}

delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete chart {name}, identifier: {id}?
delete.notFound: You have entered a chart that does not exist.
delete.alreadyWritten: You have been working on this chart for {mins} minutes since its creation.
delete.notKPA: This chart is not a KPAJSON chart. It appears to have been imported from elsewhere.
delete.hint: Deleted charts will be moved to {path}.

timeDivisor.desc: Controls the timeline density of the editor.

renderingOffset.desc: Controls the rendering offset relative to the music. Bluetooth headphone users usually need to set a lower value.

note.warning-not-from-selected-line: Warning: This Note does not belong to the selected judge line {line}.
note.warning-lone-note: Warning: This Note does not exist in the chart.

cover.desc:
If set to true, notes will not render on the opposite side of where they are located.
Set to true if you want to create the effect of notes emerging from the judge line.

father.desc: Allows this judge line to inherit the coordinate system of the father line.

anchor.desc: Controls the position of the judge line anchor relative to the texture (actually changes the texture position)

group.desc:
Groups judge lines. Only affects editing.
Judge lines in the same non-default group will be rendered together in the note and event editing areas.

zOrder.desc: Controls the order of the judge line on the Z axis. Higher values are closer to the front.

attachUI.desc:
Bind chart UI components (such as chart name, combo count) to the judge line so they move with the judge line.
A UI can only be bound to one judge line, but a judge line can bind multiple UIs.
attachUI.name: Track Name

rotatesWithFather.desc: When father line is enabled, controls whether this judge line inherits the angle of the father line.

texture.desc: Judge line texture. The default texture is a white rectangle.

judgeline.uploadWarning: Filename is already in use. Upload will overwrite the existing texture. See {dir}

showsNNN.desc: Displays secondary note nodes as snap-able timelines in the note editing area. They are typically the time points where you have previously tapped notes.

NNList.desc:
Note node list is a sequence of note nodes. They contain notes of the same major category, speed, and Y offset range.
* represents displaying all lists of the judge line.
